headline: Avery Dennison (AVY) Q3 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: Dion Stander: Thanks, Gilly, and hello, everyone.  Delivered a solid third quarter with earnings up 2% year over year and above the midpoint of expectations while continuing to execute in a dynamic environment.  In Materials Group, operational excellence was key to margin expansion during the quarter.

headline: Why Is Avery Dennison (AVY) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of adhesive manufacturing company Avery Dennison (NYSE:AVY) jumped 6.9% in the morning session after the company reported mixed third-quarter results where a profit beat overshadowed weaker-than-expected guidance.

headline: Avery Dennison’s (NYSE:AVY) Q3 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Adhesive manufacturing company Avery Dennison (NYSE:AVY) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 1.5% year on year to $2.22 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.37 per share was 1.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Avery Dennison: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MENTOR, Ohio (AP) — Avery Dennison Corp. AVY) on Wednesday reported third-quarter profit of $166.3 million. The Mentor, Ohio-based company said it had profit of $2.13 per share.

headline: Avery Dennison Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: MENTOR, Ohio, October 22, 2025--Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY), a leading global materials science and digital identification solutions company, today announced preliminary, unaudited results for its third quarter ended September 27, 2025. Non-GAAP financial measures referenced in this release are reconciled from GAAP in the attached financial schedules. Unless otherwise indicated, comparisons are to the same period in the prior year.

raw.headline: Avery Dennison Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results

Non-GAAP financial measures referenced in this release are reconciled from GAAP in the attached financial schedules. Unless otherwise indicated, comparisons are to the same period in the prior year.
